data.comment: The match has started at Oakwell Ground.
Conor Chaplin (Barnsley) has received a yellow card from Darren Bond.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Oakwell Ground.
Brentford make their first substitution with Emiliano Marcondes replacing Joshua Da Silva.
In the minute 66, Goal! Ivan Toney gives Brentford a 0-1 lead.
Victor Adeboyejo is on a sub for Conor Chaplin for Barnsley.
Herbie Kane is replacing Matty James for the home team.
In the minute 71, Clarke Oduor is replacing Alex Mowatt for Barnsley at Oakwell Ground.
Thomas Frank (Brentford) is making a second substitution, with Sergi Canos replacing Bryan Mbeumo.
Thomas Frank is making the team's third substitution at Oakwell Ground with Marcus Forss replacing Ivan Toney.
In the minute 87, The away team have replaced Tarique Fosu with Saman Ghoddos. This is the fourth substitution made today by Thomas Frank.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-1.
